title: nambikkai vaittiDuvOm
sahitya:
nambikkai vaittiDuvOm manamE jnAlamAi viLaiyADum kAlakAlan mElE


anupallavi

  ambalam tannilum akhaNDa ulaginilum aghamaghamenrE ADum tirukkUttan mEl


caraNam    vAnvaLi oLikaDal vaiyagam tAnAgi vAzhvinukk-uyirAgi vaghai vaghai inangaLAi
tAn ena nAn enat-tani mudalena vaLar jAti ariyAp-paramjyOti aruL nItiyil
